alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 8:44PM AKST until November 08 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. There will be a brief break in snow and winds tonight, however very strong winds and heavy snow with near blizzard conditions will move back into the area Monday morning and will continue into Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
